articles.author: Myles McCormick
articles.title: Slowdown in US shale patch spreads to oil services industry - Financial Times
articles.description: Companies report hit to earnings as drilling decreases in America’s energy heartland
articles.content:
Oilfield services groups are feeling the squeeze from a slowdown in activity in the US shale patch as companies scale back on oil and gas drilling.
